title: Joe Lansdale (footballer)
text:
Joseph Lansdale (4 March 1894 – 1977) was an English professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Millwall%20F.C.">Millwall</a>.
Personal life.
Lansdale served as a <a href="Gunner%20%28rank%29">gunner</a> in the <a href="Royal%20Garrison%20Artillery">Royal Garrison Artillery</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>.
